<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Lord Jhiaxus::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Jhiaxus opens a return comm to Hydras.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Jhiaxus: I'm in the air. I was bombing the Maximals when the Minions arrived. I'll engage some of these Sweeps.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Jhiaxus heads right into one of the split swarms of Sweeps and starts dogfighting them.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Scorponok-Zarak::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Zarak has Scorponok take up one position and target all weapons on the Sweeps.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>He fires off two rockets, the fusion cannon tail and all of the rapid fire turret batteries located all over Scorponok's body.</P></td></tr></table><br>
